name: Magical Medical
overview: Magical Medical is a action rpg game that takes place in a near future in which one day at the elementary school one of the students Matsudo Ayumi, suddenly suffer a collapse in the classroom. She was infected by the "Mysterious pathogen X". The player controls Paya N, an antivirus that introduce himself in the body to destroy the virus. The gameplay is to destroy the virus inside each patient body, Each body is watched in an isometric view in which the player will have to defeat the different enemies of each stage to advance through it. During the game the player will have tu cure 6 different patients.
